text: Iwo amene ankati ndi ofoka adzati kwa iwo amene adali onyada, “Iyayi! Inu munkakonza chiwembu usiku ndi usana ndipo mumatiuza ife kuti tisakhulupirire mwa Mulungu koma kukhazikitsa mafano kuonjezera pa Iye.” Ndipo iwo adzabisa kukhumudwa kwawo pamene adzaone chilango ndipo Ife tidzaika magoli m’makosi mwa iwo amene sadakhulupirire.
